def transform_dataset(test_list):
    transformed = [['']]
    current_name = None
    current_grades = []

    for entry in test_list:
        name, subject, grade = entry
        if name:
            if current_name is not None:
                transformed.append([current_name] + current_grades)
            current_name = name
            current_grades = []
            if transformed[0] == ['']:
                transformed[0] = [subject]
            else:
                transformed[0].append(subject)
        current_grades.append(grade)

    if current_name is not None:
        transformed.append([current_name] + current_grades)

    return transformed

def transform_dataset(test_list):
    transformed = [['']]
    current_name = None
    current_grades = []

    for entry in test_list:
        name, subject, grade = entry
        if name:
            if current_name is not None:
                transformed.append([current_name] + current_grades)
            current_name = name
            current_grades = []
            if transformed[0] == ['']:
                transformed[0] = [subject]
            else:
                transformed[0].append(subject)
        current_grades.append(grade)

    if current_name is not None:
        transformed.append([current_name] + current_grades)

    return transformed

# Test the function
